MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L31 and L39 postcode areas Liverpool and Ormskirk We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 9:35PM. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working on the grounded overhead cable affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4AM. If this information changes then we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:35AM on 28 April 2021.
